Token.Abstract: This protocol is used to establish the delegate for applications that allow the hand entering of transactions.
This method is called by the Manual Tender View Controller to notify the host application when a create payment method request has been completed

Parameter.Name: controller
Parameter.Abstract: Reference to the Manual Entry View Controller that is notifying the application

Parameter.Name: method
Parameter.Abstract: The payment method response sent from the Worldpay server

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: Reference to any error that may have been returned during the request

Token.Abstract: This method is called by the Manual Tender View Controller to notify the host application when a request has been completed

Parameter.Name: controller
Parameter.Abstract: Reference to the Manual Entry View Controller that is notifying the application

Parameter.Name: tender
Parameter.Abstract: The payment response sent from the Worldpay server with the authroization information

Token.Abstract: This method is called by the Manual Tender View Controller to notify the host application when a request has failed due to an error

Parameter.Name: controller
Parameter.Abstract: Reference to the Manual Entry View Controller that experienced the error

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: The error that prevented the request from being processed

Token.Abstract: This method is called by the Manual Tender View Controller to notify the host application that it is attempting to process a payment request with the supplied tender.

Parameter.Name: controller
Parameter.Abstract: Reference to the Manual Entry View Controller that is proessing the request

Token.Abstract: This method is called by the Manual Tender View Controller to notify the host application that it is has been dismissed with a request to cancel entry

Parameter.Name: controller
Parameter.Abstract: Reference to the Manual Entry View Controller that is proessing the request
